text: The ring-bearer should be accompanied by a set of individuals experienced in hand-to-hand or magical combat.
The ring-bearer should be accompanied by an individual familiar with the route to Mordor.
The fellowship should wield at least one sword, one bow, and one axe
The fellowship should have two breakfasts a day.
The fellowship should carry basic survival gear to survive harsh environmental conditions.
The fellowship should limit their consumption of Elven lempas bread.
